A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Cleaving off some of the rot of the prequels\, this film reestablishes its hero's journey heart by giving the narrative back to the nobodies. Sure\, some of Lucas' commodification of the world he created continues (here's looking to you\, space chicken)\, but the narrative falls back to the good parts of its roots while continuing to expand them. The best part is probably how the main villain is basically an angry fanboy.
